entry.title: rfc using payment_hash fields txn vs the others
entry.summary: The writer of the message is questioning the layout of the donation payment_hash txn field in the second lines stanza, which differs from the expected format. They suggest that using a code like 0x20 to indicate a non-bitcoin value or a reserved value would be more effective for deep inspection purposes, rather than the current setup. The message ends with the abbreviation "lnbc."
